Metadata.title: Yoga Programs in Chiang Mai | Master Specific Skills
Metadata.description: Choose from structured 3 and 6-session yoga programs. From foundations to advanced inversions, find the right specialist for your goals.

foundations-3.title: Yoga Foundations Intensive
foundations-3.description: A comprehensive entry point into yoga. We focus on breath-to-movement connection and spinal safety to build a safe, lifelong foundation.

mobility-6.title: Core & Mobility Series
mobility-6.description: Designed to unlock tight hips and shoulders while building deep abdominal stability and functional range of motion.

inversions-3.title: The Art of Inversion
inversions-3.description: A technical workshop series designed to conquer the fear of going upside down. Focus on shoulder stability, wrist health, and core control.

arm-balance-3.title: Arm Balances & Twists
arm-balance-3.suitableFor: All Levels • Some yoga experience recommended
arm-balance-3.description: Explore the harmony of strength and flexibility. We combine deep spinal rotations with gentle introductions to balancing on the hands, finding lightness through technique.

syllabus.title: Session 1: Finding Balance & Stability
syllabus.poses: Crow Pose, Plank variations, Garland Pose

syllabus.title: Session 2: Mobility & Deep Rotations
syllabus.poses: Side Crow, Revolved Chair, Revolved Triangle

syllabus.title: Session 3: Integration & Lift
syllabus.poses: Flying Splits prep, Lizard Pose, Eight-Angle Pose
